title: The State Of Small Business And A Look At The Markets
itunes:title: The State Of Small Business And A Look At The Markets
description:
Carol Lee Mitchell, Head of Small Business Strategy at Bank of America, discusses the state of small business. Tom Plumb, Portfolio Manager of the Plumb Balanced Fund, talks markets and investing. Rob Brown, Global CEO of Lincoln International, discusses his market outlook. Kriti Gupta, Bloomberg Markets Correspondent, gives her take on the latest market moves. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
